channel.title: Materials on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in Materials on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Wood
item.description: MDF board Properties Made by hot-pressing fiber (not sawdust) with resin. Isotropic (properties are the same in all directions as a result of no grain), so no tendency to split. Consistent in strength and size. Will deteriorate quickly if exposed to water and damp conditions. Dense and heavy. Common measurements 19mm (~.75”) thickness is used for cabinets. Cost 45 per sq ft regular <55 per sq ft prelaminated Pre Laminated Particle Board (PLPB) - Properties Made by hot-pressing sawdust (not fiber) with resin.
